alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; De Soto; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 10:16AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern De Soto, northern Red River, south central Claiborne and western Bienville Parishes through 1100 AM CST... At 1016 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Ringgold to near Mansfield. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Gibsland, Martin, Hall Summit, Castor, Jamestown, Mount Lebanon, Womack, Crichton, Sailes, Grand Bayou and Loggy Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; De Soto; Red River
